Consideration 6: Understanding the role of digital tools with cognition and student 2s actions.

The true value of digital tools emerges when we consider their role in the learners 2 educational journey.

What do students accomplish with these tools?

How do they integrate them into their learning process?

Tip: Evaluate the purpose of each digital tool.

  • Is it designed to educate, entertain, or develop specific subject skills?
  • Does it help students organise their work and foster the creation of new knowledge?
  • Or is its primary function to act as assistive technology?
